first_interaction.speaker: Station Lobby 2
first_interaction.text: Grabe naman yung nangyari kay PO1 Darwin. Laging nag-iisip ng malalim.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Lobby 1
first_interaction.text: Oo nga! Parang may tinatago siyang impormasyon. Laging secretive.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Lobby 2
first_interaction.text: Sabi nila may connection daw siya sa kaso ni Leo. Pero hindi namin alam kung ano.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Lobby 1
first_interaction.text: Basta, hindi ka makakapasok dito. May mga bagay na kailangan naming gawin.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Station Lobby 2
repeated_interaction.text: Hindi ka pa rin makakapasok dito.
